typeOfLoss.description: The type of business the loss applies to.

selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.

lossAmount.description: Brought Forward Loss amount related to UK property or self-employment business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxYear.description: The tax year the data applies to, for example, 2018-19. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2018-20 is not valid. The minimum tax year is 2018-19.
